data.title: Prince Tomohito of Mikasa Facts for Kids

data.text:
Lua error in Module:Unicode_data at line 293: attempt to index local 'data_module' (a boolean value). was a member of the Imperial House of Japan.[1]

Tomohito was the first member of the Imperial House of Japan to have a full beard since Emperor Meiji. He was known as "the bearded prince".[2]

The prince was the eldest son of Prince Mikasa who is the younger brother of former Emperor Sh≈çwa. He was a first cousin of Emperor Akihito.[5]

At the time of his death, Prince Tomohito was sixth in the line of succession to the Japanese throne.[6]
